item.title: Karl add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White

item.title: Karl add a quote by Judy Garland
item.description: "Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else." -- Judy Garland

item.title: Karl add a quote by Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings
item.description: "A woman has got to love a bad man once or twice in her life, to be thankful for a good one." -- Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

item.title: Karl add a quote by Arnold Bennett
item.description: "Any change, even a change for the better is always accompanied by drawbacks and discomforts." -- Arnold Bennett

item.title: Karl add a quote by Arnold Bennett
item.description: "The real Tragedy is the tragedy of the man who never in his life braces himself for his one supreme effort-he never stretches to his full capacity, never stands up to his full stature." -- Arnold Bennett
